title: The Cowboy and His Vegas Wedding
description: Viva Las Vegas! Wedding bells are ringing for Rock Springs... Sin City style! Anna Mae To say I have little trust in men is an understatement. After I caught my husband cheating with his secretary and he ended our marriage, I swore never to be blinded by love again. I’ve noticed Royce around for over a year now, and can’t deny the hot rush of heat I feel whenever our gazes meet. Still, I don’t trust myself enough to allow it to be more than a casual flirtation. We may both be headed to a bachelor/bachelorette party in Las Vegas, but I’m completely confident I can keep my libido in check. I mean, what’s the worst that could happen?Royce Drinks were flowing as we celebrated my sister and her fiancé’s upcoming wedding. Next thing I know, I’m waking up in bed with Anna Mae and it seems we did a whole lot more than spend the night together. Our drunken selves found a cute little chapel and tied the knot. Anna is understandably upset, but I see this as an opportunity with a beautiful woman I genuinely care for. Can I convince her to take a gamble on our happily ever after? Or once we are back in Rock Springs will we roll snake eyes on what could have been a beautiful future?Come meet the small town of Rock Springs Texas with a family that has your back, a town that knows your business, and men who love with everything they have.This is a Steamy, Small Town, Vegas Wedding Cowboy Romance. No Cliffhangers.This is Book 8 in the Rock Springs Texas Series.As always there is a satisfying Happy Ever After.If you love steamy Vegas Wedding romances with insta love, hot love scenes, small towns, and cowboys, then this one is for you.
author: Kaci Rose
